snippet.title: Infinity Nikki Gameplay Overview Trailer - Unfold Your Whim
snippet.description:
Infinity Nikki Gameplay Overview Trailer - Unfold Your Whim

Set your imagination free across the vast expanse of Miraland, and explore the beautiful world that feels uniquely yours. Each daring adventure, every moment of exploration, and each step forward becomes an expression of who you are. With the magic of whim, every choice you make will bloom into a one-of-a-kind masterpiece.

Infinity Nikki has reached 30 million global pre-registrations! Dive into our new gameplay trailer, "Unfold Your Whim."
Stylists, come along and be part of this cozy open-world adventure!

Infinity Nikki is a cozy open-world game developed by Infold Games.
■ Pre-register: https://infinitynikki.onelink.me/P6fe/mrxgprph
■ Join us on Discord: https://infinitynikki.onelink.me/ztRk/ly4q037c

#infinitynikki
